messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: UKIP has been a great force for positive change in our country and our lives over the last few years. UKIP's policies have mirrored public opinion. Over the last few years our fair but strict immigration policy and control over our legal system is holding firm. I live in Somerset and my work as a surveyor takes me across the Bridgwater and West Somerset constituency. I am therefore well aware of the stresses and problems which local people encounter and if elected will work for the good of the constituency.
